channel.title: Godsword Stance Problem
channel.description: Hello, I recently followed Cj's guide on adding the stances. And I got it perfect besides when i'm not moving it will still do the godsword walking emote nonstop. Any ideas on how to fix this? Thanks.

item.title: Godsword Stance Problem
item.dc:creator: @runescapepkserver runescapepkserver
item.description:
@runescapepkserver wrote:

[quote=“hitman2009, post:2, topic:304940”]client.java search for “public int GetStandAnim(int id)”, you’ll see items underneath there. Add one like this.
Example:
if(id == ####) <—Godsword id
{
return ####; <-----Stance id
}[/quote]Added wrong stance ID. Thank’s for reminding me bro.

Read full topic

item.title: Godsword Stance Problem
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

client.java search for “public int GetStandAnim(int id)”, you’ll see items underneath there. Add one like this.
Example:
if(id == ####) <—Godsword id
{
return ####; <-----Stance id
}
